course_title: Senior Seminar: Excel for Intermediate Users
seats: Seats: Maximum Enrollment: 30 / Seats Avail: 0Waitlist Total: 0
class_notes:
Wednesdays, 5:30-8:00 pm - Class Dates:  3/20, 3/27, 4/10, 4/17, alternate date: 4/24 (this course will be taught on four dates for 2.5 hours)


Seminar Description:  The seminar offers an engaging, hands-on format in which 90% of the class consists of students working in small groups, with frequent breaks to review the solution methodology. While useful for consulting/finance jobs, it is also very relevant other career paths.
course_description: Senior seminar courses fall outside the scope of traditional academic coursework, and instead allow students to learn from and interact with experienced practitioners, and to develop industry-specific insights, fine-tune career skills, and increase professional exposure.
